20110116190919.000|20110116190920.000|CC1|PERIOD OF TIME?                 
20110116190920.000|20110116190923.000|CC1|>> JUST SO YOU KNOW, IN THE LAST
20110116190923.000|20110116190928.000|CC1|FIVE YEARS WE HAVE TRIPLED THE  
20110116190928.000|20110116190930.000|CC1|NUMBER OF POTHOLES THAT WE      
20110116190930.000|20110116190934.000|CC1|PREPARE IN A YEAR, COMPARED TO  
20110116190934.000|20110116190935.000|CC1|THE 12 YEARS BEFORE THAT.       
20110116190935.000|20110116190938.000|CC1|I MEAN, WE ARE DOING THREE TIMES
20110116190938.000|20110116190939.000|CC1|THE NUMBER EACH YEAR THAN WE    
20110116190939.000|20110116190940.000|CC1|USED TO DO.                     
20110116190940.000|20110116190943.000|CC1|LAST YEAR WAS THE FIRST YEAR    
20110116190943.000|20110116190945.000|CC1|SINCE 1945 THAT WE WERE ACTUALLY
20110116190945.000|20110116190949.000|CC1|REPAIRING MORE STREETS THAN WERE
20110116190949.000|20110116190950.000|CC1|DETERIORATING.                  
20110116190950.000|20110116190951.000|CC1|THIS YEAR WE'RE STAYING         
20110116190951.000|20110116190951.000|CC1|CONSTANT.                       
20110116190951.000|20110116190952.000|CC1|AS YOU KNOW OVER THE WEEKEND WE 
20110116190952.000|20110116190954.000|CC1|PROMISED TO DO BETWEEN 10 AND   
20110116190954.000|20110116190956.000|CC1|15,000 POTHOLES BECAUSE OF THE  
20110116190956.000|20110116190957.000|CC1|IMPACT OF THE RAINS.
